import React from "react"; import Title from "./Title.js"; import Playlist from "./Playlist"; import Content from "./Content"; import Amplitude from "amplitudejs"; function Home() { const title = Title("MusMe","Welcome to MusMe: the Library to Find the Soundtrack for You"); const content = Content(

MusMe is an

affordable, subscription-based, royalty-free music library

powered by TwinsMusic Enterprises, based in Pelham, New York, USA.

The library features original music, sound bites, ringtones, and sound effects fit for

hundreds of moods and settings.

MusMe sets itself apart from other music libraries because all music in the library is

original acoustic music.

Each month, the MusMe team updates the library with

refreshing new music and sounds

so users will never run out of new content.

Featured Sounds
: :
: :
); return (
{title} {content} { Amplitude.init({ "bindings": { 37: 'prev', 39: 'next', 32: 'play_pause' }, "songs": [ { "name": "Risin' High (feat Raashan Ahmad)", "artist": "Ancient Astronauts", "album": "We Are to Answer", "url": "https://521dimensions.com/song/Ancient Astronauts - Risin' High (feat Raashan Ahmad).mp3" } ] }) }
); } export default Home;
